name: Carnage 2022 7DRL
description:
This game was made in 7 days for the 2022 7 Day Roguelike Challenge. It is a car battling shoot 'em up. The goal is to make it to the final stage and beat the boss.  

Controls:

W or Up:  Move Forward

S or Down: Brake (Wait)

A or Left: Move Left

D or Right: Move Right

Space: Shoot Front Gun

G: Shotgun Nearby Target

E: Shift Gears

IMPORTANT: You always move forward based on what gear you are in (L or H).

You can Brake to stay in the same location.
